Module.Content:
<script type="text/javascript" src="http://rc-ppm-2-spi.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/video.js"></script>
 <script>
 function start() {
   gcVideoMain('__UP_video__', gadgets.flash.embedFlash, 
               document.getElementById('video'));
 }
 gadgets.util.registerOnLoadHandler(start);
 </script>

 <div id="video"/>
